task.title: Creating maps
task.shortdesc: You can use maps to select, organize, and relate the topics you want to publish.

taskbody.prereq: You should know how to start a new map file before starting these tasks. See your authoring tool's help for more information.
taskbody.context: Maps consist of references to topics organized into hierarchies and tables. The containing element for a map is the <map> element. Within the map, add and organize references to the topics.

step.cmd: Save the map in a directory that will contain topics.
Change the name of the map by editing its title attribute.
step.info: The Eclipse help system requires a title on the map.

step.cmd: Delete the rest of the map content, leaving only the <map> element.
